issue.title: Add a Model Plugin for  FMI

content.raw:
If anyone is interested in FMI support for Gazebo, we have been working on that at https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-fmi . 

At the moment we only have a plugin for supporting cosimulation of the motor/trasmission/actuator part of the model with the regular Gazebo's  physics  engines.
That is different from the original suggestion of the issue (FMI to capture the dynamics of a complete model), but I guess it may be a useful pointer nevertheless.
content.html:
If anyone is interested in FMI support for Gazebo, we have been working on that at https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-fmi .

At the moment we only have a plugin for supporting cosimulation of the motor/trasmission/actuator part of the model with the regular Gazebo's physics engines. That is different from the original suggestion of the issue (FMI to capture the dynamics of a complete model), but I guess it may be a useful pointer nevertheless.
